events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in our development team.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on your experience and skills in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case and will guide you through the next steps.
We conducted an initial screening interview to discuss your background and assess your fit for the Software Engineer role.
Thank you for your prompt response and willingness to proceed with the technical interview stage.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10am UTC to evaluate your engineering and coding skills.
You have successfully completed the technical interview with positive feedback from the engineering panel.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your career goals and company culture fit on May 15th.
The HR interview was completed, and you were well received based on your alignment with our corporate values.
We have prepared a formal offer for you outlining salary, benefits, and other employment terms as discussed.
We received your positive feedback on the offer and are pleased to move forward to final onboarding preparations.
You have accepted the offer for the Software Engineer position, and we are excited to have you join our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has officially started with orientation sessions and setup for your development environment.
The hiring process is now closed successfully; welcome aboard as our newest Software Engineer.
